Title: Shared Database between Services? Maybe!
Description: Is a shared database a good or bad idea when working in a large system that's decomposed of many different services?

Title: LB Labs: Solving The Pull Request Problem w/ Continuous Merge
Description: Fact: The state of pull requests is broken and we finally have the data to prove it. In our latest LinearB Labs episode we reveal the information that has led us to the inevitable conclusion that pull requests have become a massive source of toil, bottlenecks and a huge barrier to shipping.
